name: releasenotes-azure-pipelines-task
description: Creates release notes data from commit log back to previously commit with matching tag.
author: Christian H.

inputs.name: jsonReleaseNotesPath
inputs.label: ReleaseNotes.json path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional path to output release note data in json format.

inputs.name: buildMetadataJsonPath
inputs.label: BuildMetadata.json path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional path to output build metadata data in json format.

inputs.name: nuspecPath
inputs.label: Nuspec path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional path to a nuspec that will have its release notes element set.

inputs.name: versionNumber
inputs.label: Version number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional version number to include in buildmetadata and releasenotes json output.
